snippet.title: Filmora 15: Edit Videos 10x Faster with These AI Features (Full Guide)
snippet.description:
Filmora 15 AI Video Editor - Complete Feature Tutorial

Discover the power of AI-driven video editing with Filmora 15! This comprehensive tutorial walks you through all the cutting-edge features that make video editing faster, smarter, and more creative than ever before.

Complete export: 100 points (benefit delivered within 24 hours)

üé¨ What You'll Learn:

*AI Caption Generation*
- Automatic speech-to-text transcription
- Dynamic caption styles and customization
- Multi-language translation support
- Easy positioning and formatting options

*Text-to-Video Creation*
- Generate videos from simple text prompts
- AI-powered video extension with custom instructions
- Seamless camera movement controls (zoom in/out)
- Create unlimited content variations

*Advanced Pen Tool Features*
- Add glow effects and animations to objects
- Track moving elements with keyframe animation
- Create flight path animations on maps
- Professional motion graphics made simple

*Animated Charts & Data Visualization*
- Multiple chart types: donut, column, bar, and line charts
- Import CSV and Excel data directly
- Real-time animation previews
- Full customization of colors, backgrounds, and headers

*AI Audio Tools*
- Text-to-speech generation
- AI music generation with style control (instrumental, piano, etc.)
- AI sound effects on demand
- Built-in audio library with whoosh effects and more

*Cinematic Effects*
- Professional film filters
- Color grading presets (dark, black & white, tinted)
- Split-screen templates
- Social media layout options

*Smart Editing Features*
- Smart short clips generator for long videos
- Audio-to-video conversion
- Smart scene cuts
- AI video enhancer
- Custom sticker creation

üí° Perfect For:
- Content creators and YouTubers

- Video editors of all skill levels
- Anyone looking to streamline their editing workflow
